member.name: ILaunchSourceAppUserModelId.GetAppUserModelId
member.summary: Retrieves an AppUserModelId from the source application.
member.param: Contains a pointer to a string that contains the AppUserModelId.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ILaunchSourceAppUserModelId
member.summary: Provides a method for retrieving an AppUserModelId.
